I'm Paul McFreely & I'm a Freelance Developper from France

I create Responsive Web Applications, and I sometimes write

Some of the things I do :

Web Apps

You need help with the creation or maintenance of your web application?
I can help you with that.

Prototypes

You have an idea for the next big thing(tm) but you're not sure if it can succeed?
I can help you by creating a prototype in a few weeks and help you test your idea.

E-Commerce Websites

You've created a realy nice product or brand, but you're not sure about how to sell it online?
I can help you with that.
